meanings.sent1: The membraned cell had a protective layer around it.
meanings.sent2: The membraned surface was smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The membraned balloon floated gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent4: The membraned umbrella shielded her from the rain.
meanings.sent5: The membraned structure resembled a delicate web.

meanings.definition: Covered or enclosed with a membrane.
meanings.sent1: The membraned egg was carefully protected by its shell.
meanings.sent2: The membraned door kept the room insulated.
meanings.sent3: The membraned book cover was torn and tattered.
meanings.sent4: The membraned seed was planted deep in the soil.
meanings.sent5: The membraned pouch held all her belongings securely.
